parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Get marker text.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[String]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''markerText''' markerName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[format]] ["Marker Text: %1",'''markerText''' "Marker1"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerText]], [[setMarkerTextLocal]]
</value></part></template>
